original_text: So Mephibosheth lived in Jerusalem, for he ate always at the king's table. Now he was lame in both his feet.
korean_text: 므비보셋이 항상 왕의 상에서 먹으므로 예루살렘에 사니라 그는 두 발을 다 절더라

sentences.original_text: for he ate always at the king's table.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 항상 왕의 식탁에서 식사했기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: Now he was lame in both his feet.
